directions: Cook beef and onion in 10-inch skillet over medium-high heat until beef is well browned, stirring to break up meat. Pour off fat.
Stir soup, ketchup and Worcestershire into skillet. Spoon beef mixture into 12x8-inch shallow baking dish. Arrange potatoes around edge of casserole.
Bake at 425 degrees F for 25 minutes or until potatoes are done.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  Campbell's® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup (Regular or 98% Fat Free)
title: Tater Tot Casserole
